column5: Headed to Scugog today with cpguy29 for my first time. Great guy with a lot of great info. He said the numbers weren't there but I was happy as heck. Caught a whole bunch of rock bass, caught my first largemouth and my first perch. We landed a ton of jumbos. Only got one pic tho of my bass on cpguy29's camera. Will post it later.  Thanks cpguy29 for a great day out. Look forward to it again.
Congrats on your first LMbass.Looking forward to seeing the pic.
Congratulations on the largie.  Sounds like a fun day.

It was a fun day, but some tough fishing. We maybe managed to get 10 bass to the boat, but the perch and rockbass kept us busy. Had one hit from a small muskie too. Great company, will have to do it again sometime.
As you can see I was patrolling the lake for beers.

Great report and congrats on your first bass!!!  I was out on Scugog today with Bly and my youngest daughter.  I managed my first two bass of the year there too.  Good luck out there...hope to start seeing your "New PB Report" next time out!
